main event: A witness reported sighting a bright, triangular-shaped object traveling horizontally at high speed in Pecos County, New Mexico on November 12, 1965.
interesting points: The witness described seeing a dull red object with a white streak across it, resembling a comet., The object was about 1 inch in length and 5/8 inch in diameter, with a tail three times the length of the object., The sighting lasted approximately 4 seconds before the object disappeared behind the horizon., The witness estimated the object's speed to be three times that of an F-102 jet., The witness believes there were established channels to investigate UFO sightings.
sighted object: triangular-shaped object with a dull red color and a white streak
witness description: A hunter who was with a partner during the sighting
